string.text: ...we should order more armor-piercing.
I'm not from around here in the zone, I came here not a long time ago.

Okay, Stalker, listen up, I'm talking for the first and last time. I am a local trader, and in the zone is not the first day sticking out. A lot of whom I do business with, I carry out different orders and believe my word. If I have a desire to earn some money, I always have a job to do. In the camp you can feel at home until you become insolent. And for the last time ... to the military without the need to rush. If they are offended, the helicopter and special forces will be raised from the Cordon perimeter... it will be bad for everyone. Those on top of such a shmon will visit, then in a month there will be no clients, and I have a long contact with the local commander for a long time established.
I'm already an experienced stalker, I rarely visit the cordon.

Hmm... I've got so many stalkers in a day, you won't even remember them all... Yeah, you're a serious man, I can tell. Anyway, I don't remember you, so I won't make discounts on my loot, Okay, it doesn't matter... why did you come here?
Hell, my back hurts, I don't have the strength. What do you want, stalker?
Well, hey stalker. New faces ... or have I seen you somewhere?
Don't stand there like a fly! Come on, what you brought and go!
Hello stalker. What's new?
Hey, stalker. Glad to see you alive.

Oh, a healthy stalker. That's what I need. In general, I have a new business I'm sticking to. The recently new alcoholic beverages delivered, I'm looking for new customers, are you interested? I'm Selling 3 bottles for a test for a thousand... twelve hundred and on hand.
If you're joking again, go back to the village stalker! I have enough without you.
Wait, stalker. Vodka in the zone will be useful for everyone, especially for such a jerk like you... 1100...
Okay, you convinced me.
Too expensive, and I haven't seen your vodka in my eyes. Let's do three hundred for a bottle.
No and period. I'm not interested.
This shit... okay, I'll sell it to other morons. Something came up ?
I don't change, I don't return, I don't give any guarantees...
In this case, we will agree on eight hundred hryvnias for two bottles. This is my last offer.
Okay, I'll take it.
Here you go, here you go. The product is great, you won't regret it. Thank you again... He-he.
I'll drop it.
Stalker again? I don't change cartridges for vodka, for boots too...
What you brought this time, let's see.
Hello, stalker! What do you want?
Okay, I'll take it. Hold your money.
Here you go, here you go. The product is great, you won't regret it. Thank you again... He-he.
No, I'm not interested.
A happy client is always good.
... So...Hmm. Guns. Yes, I do. Armour. Check the box. Canned food... Where are the canned goods?
... That means two grand. It's two pieces. So. This is not necessary...
... Shit. What the hell...
What kind of firearm did you sell me?
Don't you understand? Well, I found a fool, now you look for another... Heh-heh. I told you, the product is new. What you do with it is not my business. Now go, you'll think something.
Who was there to help you get back to the village? His fucking leg!
Hmm.
I would rather give out new uniforms, it's impossible already ..
I hope you're not smuggling?
We don't want to get the damn thing thrown out again...
They've got mutant creatures in their pockets.
Honorable to introduce myself, Jurov. Commander of the southern cordon checkpoint.
Health wish, captain.
At ease! Good to see the new faces on the post. Do you have something to do with me?
Health wish!
Yes? How can I help you?
Well, what do you want?
Health wish! Looking for something?
Be careful with the mutants.
Ask, I'll help.
What can I do for you?
We'd like to get new boots.
And why do stalkers climb into the zone, live or not...
The helmet's cracked, we need to polish it...
How did it work?
How long has it been thrown out?
Who's been messing with my mines?
Vodka would be good now...
Hello, stalker! Fix or cure it? I can do it all.
We should have gone for a programmer... Ugh...

Hey, man! I see you're not from around here, you're new. Let's meet, I'm a mechanic, my name is Sergei. Don't salute by rank, let's agree at once in simple terms with each other. I'll describe to you the situation with the possibilities. In general, our checkpoint isn't in excellent condition and keeps on the good word due to my efforts. Consider that I make a lock out of the mud, but the lock is still out of the mud, well, you understand. No good tools, I almost hand-mount things on my knees. You're a free guy, if you find something, bring it right away, I'm not rich, but I'll do what I can. If time will be, I can ask for all sorts of "favors," but about that later. By the way, if you haven't yet been to the commander, I advise you to stop by. You'll be able to buy some gear from him and get a couple of official assignments. Uh... Busted you with words, you might need something?
Hey, man, what do you want?
Did you find any tools?
Listen, have you seen any parts? No?
Oh, hey! Is the gun jammed again?
Have you seen me recently? I'm sorry, my memory is bad.
Where's my 17 wrench...it's been right here.
There are extra parts left over again... That's fine.
Any job?
Well, there's one, you have to rush into the swamps and pick up a case from the church.
Can we talk?
No, man. I'm not in the mood to talk right now, go get somebody else.
Hog, Vicarii shared with me about Limansk and your problem, can you tell me more?

Ugh, eat him by the leg. What? I told him that right away? ...I'm not going to hide it. Listen carefully, I'm not going to repeat - In "Limansk" a lot of our people are missing, no bodies, no blood, no traces. They just disappeared as if they weren't there at all. Dushman sent a search party under Gene's command, and with him, my brother Pasha... In general, he also went missing... Missing... I didn't understand how it happened, like he was here, but now he's not. I remember a couple of days ago, it was raining outside, time later... I went out for a smoke, and at the same time to have a word with Sergei, my friend, on patrol then. Only the smoke let in, I see something running, in general, it scared us, while we almost got shot. I ran, all dumbfounded, in the mud, and alone, couldn't say a word. Then, an hour later, he took off and reported everything to the commander and told me after a while. In general...my brother is missing, and only sometimes we can hear fragments of phrases on the radio, and where he is, we can not find.
Where's Jin now?
Man, you don't seem to be one-eyed. At the top, he props up the boxes as usual.
What's with the radio signal?

Nothing good... Count it and no, fragments of radio messages from time to time come. Only they make me bleed in my veins, here's the record, listen - "...P...grave...We are stuck in L...Ansk...We...will not get out...our coordinates...five, four, two....". I have a few more of them, I recognize our voices... and the voice of my brother, too.
Maybe I can help you somehow?

Hmm... I'm not forcing you, but if you're in Limansk, try looking for details in the houses. Our receiver was damaged during transportation, the guys had to run from a pack of boars. Now it catches no further than a couple of kilometers. We need a new antenna and a couple of new resistors to make it work again. And then maybe we can get in touch with them. Stalker... Be careful, I don't want anyone else to go missing...
Sorry about that, sorry about that, sorry.
And thank you for that, I'll keep trying, maybe I can get caught up in something.
And you tried to find your brother yourself?

I wanted to go, I really wanted to go. But a contract is a contract, the eggheads are not inclined no matter how much I try to persuade them, and I do not blame them. they can't risk people anymore, too many losses without any leads, just interference and the missing souls of the mercenaries.
I'll try to talk to him, maybe I can do something about it.
Don't be discouraged, I think he'll appear.
Okay, thank you.
Okay, what else did you want to ask?
Thanks for sharing, that's all.
Whatever you say.
Yeah, what is it?
Did you see yourself in the mirror? Pale as a ghost! Go fast to Vikarius, he will examine you. It wasn't enough for you to be stuck behind the machine.
Oh, I haven't seen you in a while. What did you come with?
Man, you look like a fake pseudo dog, you should go to a doctor.
The blind dogs are hungry again. I heard them howl out last night...
Be careful in the zone, stalker. Especially here.
We shouldn't have come here...
Eh... Pasha... Where have you gone, brother...
Stalkers these days are like cormorants in a nuclear reactor. Nobody really understands them.
If you give someone a helping hand, they'll bite you off... on the shoulder.

...How many times do I have to tell you? No, not yet. Shit... Sorry, man, I'm sorry. I was pulled over five times a day to ask. I am Hog, a mechanic. Not commander Hog, not merchant Hog, not Doctor Hog - just Hog. Well, what can I do to help?
Damn... where are those nuts?
It seems like I can't fix it anymore...
Ex....I'd like a liquor now.
Fucking radio! Damn... Silence again.
Blin, and where did I put my bolts...
She told me... Don't go to the zone... Oh fool, oh fool...
Hurry up, the barrels don't fix themselves.
What's the problem?
We need to polish...
This helmet's cracked.
Hmm... It will take a lot of tape...
Damn it... This job requires me to give my full commitment.
I'm listening.
Vicarius, I've got the right samples.
Great, now I need time, come back later.
Vicarius, can you look at me?
I'm afraid the stitches won't close this wound.
Hmm.
Doc, how's my condition?
Doc, how bad is it?

Hmm... Surface tissue damage, multiple traces of wounds, open wound. I can perform the operation to stabilize it, this service will cost 2500 UAH. You are irradiated, you have all the signs of an initial stage of radiation sickness. In addition, using 'dimethyl sulfide' and 'graphene' to help your radionuclide excretion system, it will cost you another 3000. So what have you decided?
Get to work immediately.
All is ready, now I'll call an assistant and we'll fix you up...using local anesthetics, it will take some time for their action, try to be patient...let's do an infusion of a physical solution...
I helped your body to eliminate radiation, but you still need treatment. Do it sooner, my friend.
I can't treat you for free. Try not to die.
Get my radiation exposure.
I don't have the means.

Felt in trouble, huh? Sufficiently severe tissue damage, internal organs are not hurt, you're lucky. This unfortunate adventure will cost you 2500 UAH for your work and medication. I can also help your body to recover from radiation exposure will cost extra 3000 UAH.
I can't help for free. My resources are limited.
Spare me the pain, Doctor.
Doc, I've been exhausted by radiation, sorcerer, hurry up.
It's too expensive.

I can treat you, I can also help the body cope with the effects of radiation. For your health work and medication you pay 2500 UAH. For helping with radiation 3000 UAH. Unfortunately, I cannot treat you for free. What have you decided?
Without money, I can't help you. These are the rules, try not to die.
Vicarius, start the treatment.
Doc, spare me the radiation.
The price is too high.
Very interesting.
What do you say, Doc?
I hope you're just allergic.
After the anomaly, how bad is it?
Hmm. Your wound smells like chicken...
Doc, how bad is it?
This is gonna hurt right now. Hold on to something.
Not in my work schedule, please. Physically you are healthy. Go outside, you can sleep there and do all the other things that such "special" people as you do.
You are completely healthy, if you think otherwise, then I have some bad news for you, maybe you are a walker, or you are suffering from aggregation. Relax and calm down, you are really okay.
You look good and are completely healthy. You are not at all attracted to my regular patients. If you feel unwell, I advise you to take preventative measures and to eat well and sleep well.
You're a strong and healthy man, if you don't feel well, go and talk with some stalkers on a fire.
It'll be more painful than ever in your life.
I'm used to the pain, what's wrong with me?
Well, next time, use bandages, okay?
Okay. Doc, let's hurry.
Son, you're not gonna make it.
I'm gonna get through this, and I've never been in so much trouble as I am, Doc?
How long have you been sitting on Epinephrine?
Hmm... I don't remember, you'll help me?
Do not touch the scab on the wounds.
Doc, how's my condition?
Hmm... Penetration on the chest.
Soon, can you patch it up a little bit?
I'm afraid I'm out of oral thermometers.
Hell, the thermometer's freezing!
I'm afraid we'll have to do the operation.
So serious?
Doc, do you need some help?

I'd appreciate it if you could find me one book. "Guide to Internal Pathology." I used to live here with a colleague of mine who used to like to collect various rare books. But after his death, his wife sold all his books for nothing. Unfortunately, I don't know the fate of the books, but I do know that this book stayed in his apartment. I don't remember the apartment number, but I know the house exactly. Interested?
Where should I start my search?
Multi-storey, half-decayed house across the street is a corner to our base.
Multi floor old building, a half-decayed house across the street is a corner to our base.
Multi floor old building, half-decayed house across the street is a corner to our base.
Not now, not much to do. Let's talk about it later.
You haven't done the past yet.
Will you be okay with being a test subject? I have one hypothesis about new medications, but I can't do without your help. All details after the agreement.
Sounds interesting, what's on your mind, Doc?
I need to get a fresh specimen of the head of a tushkano for my work in creating a new medication. I won't go into details, we'll talk when you find the head.
Okay, it's gonna take me a while, I'll let you know when I find the sample.
I'm sorry, but I'm scared of the test subject's word.
Come back later.
I've already been in trouble and I know how to help myself.

Welcome. Hmm... I haven't seen you before. I think we should meet if you want to live a little longer. I am a Vicarius, a doctor. I am trying to collect pieces of less successful stalkers than you. I can tell you how not to die at the first injury in the zone. From time to time, I also have kits of medicines and instruments that will be useful for you in field treatment. If I am interested, I sometimes need outside help. Well, what can I do for you?
Glad you're still alive.
Nice to see someone who can move around on their own.
I had a dream about a monolith...
This is pretty quiet...
Welcome back, stalker.
Nice to see you, stalker.
What's the matter, do you need help?
What can I do for you?
Let me see your wounds.
Bad look, are you hurt?
Blood stains on your clothes, they belong to you?
Bad thing to do, can I see you?
You look a little tired.
...another squad in trouble...
Doc, tell me more about the wounds and treatment.

I hope you don't need this, but listen carefully. In the Zone, frequent injuries occur for a variety of reasons, whether it's a mutant attack, bullet wounds or negative anomalies. Tissue damage is often accompanied by bleeding. In this case, I advise you to apply a bandage tightly to prevent bleeding and protect the tissues from the environment. Change the bandage as soon as it is dirty. I warn you, do not use anything in the area other than sterilized bandages. I've already had enough smart people using fabrics, rags and much more to get around to. The result was the infection of the wound with the further development of sepsis and gangrene and the subsequent fatal outcome. If you lose a lot of blood, you will faint. And, die.
Are there other ways to prevent bleeding, or what if it's stronger?
Hmm... There are 4 main themes: "stopping bleeding", "healing wounds", "extraction of radiation", "psi impact". What are you interested in?

You can use special bandages or use blood stains. Vinca is a common drug in the community. For a short period of time increases blood clotting in the body that further helps to eliminate heavy bleeding, but the wound still have to bandage.
Doc, let's talk about stopping the bleeding.
Demonstrate healing of wounds.

As well as stopping bleeding after mechanical damage to the body's tissues, you'll need stabilization for further recovery. A personal first aid kit and stimulants will do just fine. The first-aid kits range from the simplest to the most advanced, radiation-absorbing and time-efficient regeneration of tissues. Each of them will have instructions, I advise you to read so that in the heat of battle you don't inject yourself for example... Sleeping pills. What touches the stimulants, they use the resources of the body depleting it in return for increasing the rate of healing of tissues. Don't forget to eat, otherwise you'll faint.
Don't mind hearing about radiation extraction.

Beware of places where anomalies, old equipment and other radioactive stains accumulate. I advise you to always have a geiger counter at hand. Before entering these areas, use radio-protective drugs or get a good suit with a closed breathing system that will provide mechanical protection from external radiation factors. Prevention is the best protection. Also check all the objects you use, radiation can settle on food, water and medical products including. If you are irradiated by antiradiation drugs, remember that they use the body's resources, which leads to starvation and exhaustion.
What if I don't have any protection or means of radiation removal at hand at the right time, what should I do?

You can use the old proven method of drinking alcoholic beverages... Hmm... I have also heard that local cigarette suppliers have agreed with some manufacturers and have introduced radiation-absorbing substances into their tobacco products. Also, some medical products and treatment kits may contain antiradiation compounds.
Say something about psi exposure.

In the Zone, there is a specific impact on the human psyche and the brain in general, called psy-fields. This impact is extremely negative. Being exposed to intense psi fields can cause serious brain damage, which leads to madness at best, or to personality destruction and zombification at worst. The consequences are hallucinations, loss of movement coordination, severe headaches and various mental disorders. Long-term exposure to psy-fields either completely destroys the human brain or irreversibly changes the brain.
And how do you handle it?

Run away... There are some drug developments such as Psyblock that slow down psi effects on the body, as well as some costume protection technologies, but they will not provide you with complete protection against psy effects.
Thank you, Doc, I've learned enough.
Treatment later, now I'm interested in other things.
Okay, what are we talking about?
I took a long time to look all over the house, but I found your book.

... It was his favorite book... I am glad that your search was a success. Excellent copy, antiques. Nice paste, well-preserved pages...thank you for your help. Here is your reward, perhaps later I will find clues where to look for the rest of the books.
Doc, tell me more about the wounds and treatment.
Hmm... There are three main themes, "stopping bleeding", "healing wounds", "extraction of radiation", "psi impact" What are you interested in?
Doc, let's talk about stopping the bleeding.

I hope you don't need this, but listen carefully. In the area, frequent injuries occur for a variety of reasons, whether it's a mutant attack, bullet wounds or negative anomalies. Tissue damage is often accompanied by the discovery of bleeding. In this case, I advise you to apply a bandage tightly to prevent bleeding and protect the tissues from the environment. Change the bandage as soon as it is dirty. I warn you, do not use anything in the area other than sterilized bandages. I've already had enough smart people using fabrics, rags and much more to get around to. The result was the infection of the wound with the further development of sepsis and gangrene and the subsequent fatal outcome. If you lose a lot of blood, you will faint. Lost defenseless, die.
Are there other ways to prevent bleeding, or what if it's stronger?

You can use special bandages or use blood stains. Vinca is a common drug in the community. For a short period of time increases blood clotting in the body that further helps to eliminate heavy bleeding, but the wound still have to bandage.
Deemonstrate healing of wounds.

As well as stopping bleeding after mechanical damage to the body's tissues, you'll need stabilization for further recovery. A personal first aid kit and stimulants will do just fine. The first-aid kits range from the simplest to the most advanced, radiation-absorbing and time-efficient regeneration of tissues. Each of them will have instructions, I advise you to read so that in the heat of battle you don't inject yourself for example... Sleeping pills. What touches the stimulants, they use the resources of the body depleting it in return for increasing the rate of healing of tissues. Don't forget to eat, otherwise you'll faint.
Don't mind hearing about radiation extraction.

Beware of places where anomalies, old equipment and other radioactive stains accumulate. I advise you to always have a geiger counter at hand. Before entering these areas, use radio-protective drugs or get a good suit with a closed breathing system that will provide mechanical protection from external radiation factors. Prevention is the best protection. Also check all the objects you use, radiation can settle on food, water and medical products including. If you are irradiated by antiradiation drugs, remember that they use the body's resources, which leads to starvation and exhaustion.
What if I don't have any protection or means of radiation removal at hand at the right time, what should I do?

You can use the old proven method of drinking alcoholic beverages... Hmm... I have also heard that local cigarette suppliers have agreed with some manufacturers and have introduced radiation-absorbing substances into their tobacco products. Also, some medical products and treatment kits may contain antiradiation compounds.
Say something about psi exposure.

In the Zone, there is a specific impact on the human psyche and the brain in general, called psy-fields. This impact is extremely negative. Being exposed to intense psi fields can cause serious brain damage, which leads to madness at best, or to personality destruction and zombification at worst. The consequences are hallucinations, loss of movement coordination, severe headaches and various mental disorders. Long-term exposure to psy-fields either completely destroys the human brain or irreversibly changes the brain.
And how do you handle it?

Run away... There are some drug developments such as Psyblock that slow down psi effects on the body, as well as some costume protection technologies, but they will not provide you with complete protection against psy effects.
Doc, let's continue next time.
Thanks, with your help, I won't disappear so easily now. This concludes the conversation.
Vicarius, can we talk about different things?
Okay, I don't mind talking within reason. What will we talk about?
Tell me about yourself, who are you, where are you from?
You ask for nothing, not in my compilation to disclose such information by virtue of the contract. I am an executive person.
You won't even tell me a little bit about the general outlines?
Right, let's change the subject.
Tell me more about the city itself.

Hmm... let me think... In general, the dead city is not just named. Previously, it was habitated by foreign power engineers who did not have a place of residence in the local area, and so built this town for them. What happened to it after the accident, I think you understand. Now, apart from our human stronghold in the area, there are only dead and empty houses and mutants. Beware, you can often come across zombies and other dangerous mutants in the area. By the way, there are two large anomalous clusters nearby. The first is west of us in private one-storey houses, be careful if you decide to search them. The second zone of anomalies is located to the east of us rather wide glade over the tunnel.
What can you tell us about the surroundings?
In the north there's a way to Limansk, right through the gate and further down the road, and in the east the tunnel network leads to the old army warehouses. Where do I start?
I want to talk about Limansk.
Did you try to find your people?

Of course we tried. The search operation was carried out by Leopard, but even with his experience of a tracker, the search was not successful, and in the end we lost three more people. I heard that Hog has been trying to establish a connection for a long time, but unfortunately nothing happened and Dushman stopped looking. If you're wondering, you can ask them more, it's no secret information, I think they'll share it with you.

Don't get it wrong, I'm a reasonable man, but not all aspects of the zone can be understood with the mind, at least because of the unclear nature of these phenomenoms. Have you ever read the works of Professor Kuznetsov "XXI century. Chronicle of temporary anomalies"? His assumption is that such holes are in the entire surface of the earth. Outside the zone, due to lack of evidence, this issue is not so popular, but people, ships, and even entire cities disappear. Later appearing in other parts of the world. He also believes that there is something in the zone that creates these spatial holes much more often than elsewhere. Such proximity to us scares me a little bit. Some of our units have already disappeared, we hear from time to time fragments of phrases on the radio, and there is nothing good in these phrases. This is a terrible fate.

Unfortunately, it is. Limansk...a lot of people died in it. Many of our units are missing in it and we don't know exactly why. Most likely, the city is a concentration of spatial anomalies. They are hard to detect and even harder to get out.

It's an old and gloomy city. Once upon a time on the outskirts of its narrow streets was bubbling with life. And now it is only a shadow of the past inhabited by mutants and many abnormal origins. I had the opportunity to participate in some of the attacks in this area and believe me on my word, without the need to go there is better not to sink in. I heard from scouts that in addition to the mutated organisms in the northern parts of the city there were also monolith detachments. In a place like this, you don't have to strain yourself to die, just relax and I won't be able to help you anymore. They even said that someone saw strange shadows...
Shadows? What are you talking about, Doc?
Come on, you're thickening the paint. Ordinary city, no worse than this.
Doc, this is all very interesting, but let's change the subject and talk about Warehouses.
Vicarius, it's been a pleasure talking to you, and we'll continue next time.
However you say I don't mind.
Let's talk about army warehouses.

Dangerous terrain, many radiation spots, in some places there are clusters of anomalies, especially in the nearest village. Stalkers say it is better to not stay overnight in it. Previously, the area was called the "Quiet Hills", but later people began to call it army warehouses in connection with the military base located there. At the moment it is controlled by a freedom cell. If your road will lie through the warehouses, be careful, there is a high probability of fighting with the mutants that come from behind the barrier.
Okay, I got everything I needed.
Help Vicarius: Wait.
Help the Vicar: go back and talk to the doctor.
Doc, is the drug ready?
Yeah, here you go. And here's your reward.
No, not ready yet.
I need some more time.
Vicarius asked me to find the book in a old convenience store building near the mercenary base.
I found the book the Vicar was looking for, so I have to go back for a reward.
Help Vicar: Find a guide to internal pathology.
Help Vicar: Give the book to Vicar.
Stalker, Vicar. The serum is ready.
Vikarius wants me to find him a head of a Tushkano to synthesize the healing serum.
I found the head of the Tushkano for Vicar, so I just had to go back and get the reward.
Help the Vicar: Find the head of the Tushkano.
Help Vicar: Pass the head to Vicar.
Vicar is synthesizing the serum, I should go for a walk and come back a little later.
Vicarius has informed me that the drug is ready, I need to talk with him.
